description: Shoot fast-action photos and capture HD video with the Lexar Platinum II SDHC card. This high-speed, high-capacity card gives you the power to fully leverage the photo- and video-taking abilities of your SDHC-enabled digital point-and-shoot, DSLR, or camcorder. The card has a Class 6 speed rating with a transfer speed of up to 100x (15MB/s). It’s also available in a range of large capacities, including a 32GB option that can be used for netbook memory expansion. Includes limited lifetime warranty.
title: Lexar Platinum II 32 GB 100x SDHC Flash Memory Card LSD32GBSBNA100
